gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 116, Bulls 100
gameRecap.excerpt: The Knicks defeated the Bulls, 116-100. Julius Randle led the Knicks with 35 points (23 in second half), six rebounds, and four assists as Jalen Brunson (31 points, 13 assists) and Isaiah Hartenstein (10 points, a career-high 20 rebounds) totaled 41 points. This marks the first time this season a pair of Knicks have gone for 30+ points in a single game. DeMar DeRozan (28 points) and Coby White (26 points, eight assists) led the Bulls in defeat. The Knicks improve to 19-15 as the Bulls move to 15-21.
